channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Foxニュースは、ハンター・バイデンの模擬裁判を演出した6部構成のストリーミング・シリーズを、バイデンの弁護団が同ネットワークを訴えると脅した翌日に取り下げた（David Folkenflik/NPR）
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
Fox News takes down a six-part streaming series that staged a mock trial of Hunter Biden, a day after Biden's legal team threatened to sue the network  —  Fox News has pulled down a six-part series in which it staged a mock trial of hypothetical criminal charges against Hunter Biden …

item.title: BBCニュースの女性司会者4人がBBCを相手取り訴訟を開始、1年間放送を強制停止され、2023年には「見せかけ」の採用プロセスの犠牲者になったとしている（Jake Kanter/Deadline）
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
Four female BBC News presenters start legal action against BBC, saying they were forced off air for a year and were victims of a “sham” hiring process in 2023  —  Four female BBC News presenters have commenced legal action against the UK broadcaster, arguing they were forced off air …

item.title: コムキャストは、ダイヤモンド・スポーツ・グループとの料金紛争で、同社のケーブルテレビ顧客が深夜に15のバリー地域スポーツネットワークへのアクセスを失うと予想（Christopher Palmeri/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Christopher Palmeri / Bloomberg:
Comcast expects its cable TV customers to lose access to 15 Bally regional sports networks at midnight in a fee dispute with Diamond Sports Group  —  “We'd like to continue carrying their networks, but they have declined multiple offers and now we no longer have the rights to this programming …

item.title: BBCは、2024年の米国選挙報道計画の一環として、ロス・アトキンス分析編集長率いるDCを拠点とする偽情報対策のためのBBC Verify USを立ち上げる（BBCスタジオ）
item.description:
BBC Studios:
The BBC launches BBC Verify US to combat disinformation, led by Analysis Editor Ros Atkins and based in DC, as part of its 2024 US elections coverage plans  —  Brand New Digital Experience Enables Up-to-the-Minute, 360-Content via All-New BBC.com, BBC app, Daily Live Pages, Podcasts, Newsletters, and More

item.title: レッドバードIMI撤退後のテレグラフ買収候補者：デイリー・メールの経営者ジョナサン・ハームスワース氏、チェコの大富豪ダニエル・クレチンスキー氏、マードック氏など（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
A look at potential Telegraph bidders after RedBird IMI walked: Daily Mail proprietor Jonathan Harmsworth, Czech billionaire Daniel Kretinsky, Murdoch, and more  —  - Conservative-leaning UK newspaper is a coveted media asset  — UAE-backed takeover was thwarted by British politicians

item.title: 広告、アニメーション、不動産業界の幹部が行ったテストでは、オープンエイのSoraはRunwayやPikaよりもリアルな顔の特徴を持つ人物を生成した（Financial Times）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
In tests run by executives in advertising, animation, and real estate, OpenAI's Sora generated people with more realistic facial features than Runway or Pika  —  The FT asked workers in animation, advertising and real estate to test rival AI systems that create short clips

item.title: 旅行会社で年間1億2000万ドルを稼ぎ出し、110冊の本を出版し、12シーズンの旅行番組を撮影し、750以上のポッドキャスト・エピソードを制作したリック・スティーブスのプロフィール（Natalie B. Compton/Washington Post）
item.description:
Natalie B. Compton / Washington Post:
A profile of Rick Steves, whose travel company makes $120M yearly, published 110 books, filmed 12 seasons of his travel show, and produced 750+ podcast episodes  —  Travel mogul.  Philanthropist.  Legal weed champion.  The real Rick Steves is so much more complex than who you see on TV.

item.title: Fubo、提携更新交渉が決裂したWBDとの提携を解消、WBDの "巨大な市場権力の乱用 "を理由に（Jacob Bryant/The Wrap）
item.description:
Jacob Bryant / The Wrap:
Fubo cuts ties with WBD after renewal negotiations for their partnership fell through, citing WBD's “abuse of massive market power” as cause for the decision  —  The media company accuses WBD of refusing “to engage in good faith negotiations”  —  Fubo cut ties with Warner Bros. Discovery …

item.title: 米国の視聴者は、第1四半期に1日の広告付き聴取時間の67％を放送ラジオ、20％をポッドキャスト、残りをストリーミング・オーディオまたは衛星ラジオに費やした（ニールセン調べ）。
item.description:
Nielsen:
US audiences gave 67% of their daily ad-supported audio time to over-the-air radio in Q1, 20% to podcasts, and the rest to streaming audio or satellite radio  —  Are you listening?  As the audio horizon expands, the ways audiences are tuning in is shifting.

item.title: NBCユニバーサルがNBAの試合放映権を年間約25億ドルで落札する用意があるとのWSJの報道を受け、WBDの株価は52週ぶりの安値に（Melvin Backman/Quartz）
item.description:
Melvin Backman / Quartz:
WBD shares hit a 52-week low after a WSJ report suggested WBD could lose rights to NBA games, as NBCUniversal is prepared to bid about $2.5B per year for rights  —  The stock hit a 52-week low and was one of the S&P 500's worst performers of the day  —  Warner Bros Discovery stock hit …

item.title: ワーナー・ミュージック・グループのロバート・カインクルCEOと歌手のFKAツイッグスが、米上院委員会で、非合意のAIディープフェイクから人々を守る計画を支持する証言を行った（Thania Garcia/Variety）
item.description:
Thania Garcia / Variety:
Warner Music Group CEO Robert Kyncl and singer FKA twigs testify before a US Senate committee to support a plan to defend people from nonconsensual AI deepfakes  —  ‘We must enact regulation now to safeguard our authenticity and protect against misappropriation of our inalienable rights,’ FKA Twigs said.

item.title: TwitchがTikTokのようなディスカバリーフィードを展開、TwitchのiOSとAndroidアプリ内のタブとして起動し、ライブストリームやクリップを表示する（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Twitch rolls out its TikTok-like discovery feed, launching as a tab within the Twitch iOS and Android apps, showing live streams and clips  —  Twitch is officially rolling out its new TikTok-like discovery feed to all users this week, the company announced on Tuesday.

item.title: ソースパラマウントとチャーターが契約更新交渉を延長、買収交渉中のパラマウントのキャッシュフローに影響する契約は4月30日に切れる予定だった（Jennifer Maas/Variety）
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
Source: Paramount and Charter extend contract renewal talks; the contract, which affects Paramount's cash flow amid buyout talks, was set to expire on April 30  —  Paramount Global and Charter Communications agreed to extend their talks on a deal renewal, which — for now …

item.title: アマゾン、第1四半期の広告収入は前年同期比24%増の118億ドル（予想117億ドル）、ストア事業とプライム・ビデオ事業の成長が牽引（Todd Spangler/Variety
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Amazon reports Q1 ad revenue up 24% YoY to $11.8B, vs. $11.7B est., driven by the growth of its Stores and Prime Video businesses  —  Amazon raked in $11.82 billion in advertising revenue for the first quarter of 2024, topping analyst expectations, fueled by the ecommerce giant's move …

item.title: アマゾン、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比13％増の1,433億ドル、純利益は前年同期比32億ドル増の104億ドル、営業利益は前年同期比48億ドル増の153億ドル、サブスクリプション売上高は11％増の107億ドル（Annie Palmer/CNBC）
item.description:
Annie Palmer / CNBC:
Amazon reports Q1 revenue up 13% YoY to $143.3B, a $10.4B net income, vs. $3.2B YoY, $15.3B operating income, vs. $4.8B YoY, subscription sales up 11% to $10.7B  —  Amazon CEO Andy Jassy speaks at the Bloomberg Technology Summit in San Francisco on June 8, 2022.
